typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp (toTimestamp("01-01-1900")),
	modifiedBefore as timestamp (currentTimestamp())
}
source(output(
		Category as string,
		Subcategory as string,
		Model as string,
		ListPrice as double,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		Product as string,
		SKU as string,
		ProductId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'ProductData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> ProductDataSource
ProductDataSource aggregate(groupBy(ProductId),
	Category = last(Category),
		Subcategory = last(Subcategory),
		Model = last(Model),
		ListPrice = last(ListPrice),
		Color = last(Color),
		StandardCost = last(StandardCost),
		Product = last(Product),
		SKU = last(SKU)) ~> Deduplicated1ProductDataDeltaSource
Deduplicated1ProductDataDeltaSource keyGenerate(output(ProductKey as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> surrogateKey1
surrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimProduct',
	recreate:true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> ItemSink
